title: Day Night Vigilante

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your ability resolves at the end of the day. If your target dies, their death announcement happens after the beginning of the next night.
- You can only shoot someone thrice.
- If you kill a Town member, you will commit suicide at the end of the next day out of guilt.
